sections.purpose: To produce high-purity double-distilled water for sensitive microbiological applications.
sections.scope: Applicable to high-purity water generation in Microbiology.
procedure: Ensure the primary distilled water reservoir is filled.
Switch ON the double distillation unit.
Allow the system to reach steady-state operation.
Collect the double-distilled water from the outlet in a sterile, closed container.
Monitor conductivity periodically to confirm purity.
Shut down the unit according to manufacturer guidelines after use.
Clean and descale both boiler chambers at recommended intervals.
Record production volume and quality test results.
precautions: Avoid touching hot surfaces and steam lines.
Ensure the unit has proper ventilation to dissipate heat.
Do not bypass any safety interlocks.
Use only approved replacement parts for maintenance.
Protect electrical components from water splashes.
